#summary Would you like to contribute?

= How to contribute =

If you want to contribute to improve this software, you are welcome! You can contribute in many ways:
 * link this project to you web sites
 * using and distributing this software and let us know where/how 
 * submitting bug, enhancements and (statistical) suggestion issues in the Issue tab
 * submitting patches and then becoming a committer of teh project
